name: Alcatraz: VR Escape Room
description: "Alcatraz: VR Escape Room" is a story based puzzle game inspired by such classics as Crimson Room. You discover bits and pieces about your life from notes left behind from someone who is trying to help you escape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 800 MB available space
